## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.collapse() method

Collapses the specified value(s) in the accordion.

If the value is currently expanded, it will be collapsed. If the value is currently collapsed, it will remain collapsed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
collapse(value: T | T[]): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

value


</td><td>

T \| T\[\]


</td><td>

The value or array of values to collapse.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
